title: Wood sanding machine US-CES100
short_description: This equipment US-CES100, which is convenient for sanding wood, is equipped with a motor with a power of 2.2 kW. The main thing is that this equipment works at 220V voltage. The length of the sanding belt is 250 cm, and the width is 15 cm.
short_description_uz: Yog'ochni shlifovka qilish uchun qulay bo'lgan ushbu US-CES100 uskuna 2.2 kW quvvatga ega bo'lgan motor bilan jihozlangan. Eng asosiysi ushbu uskuna 220V kuchlanishda ishlaydi. Shlifovka qiluvchi tasma uzunligi 250 sm, kengligi esa 15 sm ni tashkil qiladi.
short_description_ru: Это US-CES100 оборудование, удобное для шлифования древесины, оснащено двигателем мощностью 2,2 кВт. Главное, чтобы данное оборудование работало при напряжении 220В. Длина шлифовальной ленты 250 см, ширина 15 см.
short_description_en: This equipment US-CES100, which is convenient for sanding wood, is equipped with a motor with a power of 2.2 kW. The main thing is that this equipment works at 220V voltage. The length of the sanding belt is 250 cm, and the width is 15 cm.
long_description:
This equipment US-CES100, which is convenient for sanding wood, is equipped with a motor with a power of 2.2 kW. The main thing is that this equipment works at 220V voltage. The length of the sanding belt is 250 cm, and the width is 15 cm.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-CES100
Voltage....................................................................................... 220V / 50 Hz........................................................................................................
Motor power 2.2 kW
Sanding belt size 250*15 cm
long_description_uz:
Yog'ochni shlifovka qilish uchun qulay bo'lgan ushbu US-CES100 uskuna 2.2 kW quvvatga ega bo'lgan motor bilan jihozlangan. Eng asosiysi ushbu uskuna 220V kuchlanishda ishlaydi. Shlifovka qiluvchi tasma uzunligi 250 sm, kengligi esa 15 sm ni tashkil qiladi.

 

Umumiy parametrlar
Model US-CES100
Kuchlanishi............................................................................... 220V / 50 Hz........................................................................................................
Motor quvvati 2.2 kW
Tasma o'lchami 250*15 sm
long_description_ru:
Это US-CES100 оборудование, удобное для шлифования древесины, оснащено двигателем мощностью 2,2 кВт. Главное, чтобы данное оборудование работало при напряжении 220В. Длина шлифовальной ленты 250 см, ширина 15 см.

 

Общие параметры
Модель US-CES100
Напряжение............................................................................... 220В/50 Гц........................................................................................................
Мощность двигателя 2.2 кВт
Размер ремня 250*15 см
long_description_en:
This equipment US-CES100, which is convenient for sanding wood, is equipped with a motor with a power of 2.2 kW. The main thing is that this equipment works at 220V voltage. The length of the sanding belt is 250 cm, and the width is 15 cm.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-CES100
Voltage....................................................................................... 220V / 50 Hz........................................................................................................
Motor power 2.2 kW
Sanding belt size 250*15 cm
